author: chinthaka
msg: Adding classes used for memory profiling for later use.

author: chinthaka
msg: SGCtxt and ServiceContexts are also garbage collected now. Eventhough this was achieved using a thread initially, we thought better to minimize the number of threads. So now this GC happens, whenever there is an addition to the serviceGroupContextMap in the configuration context.
Another good news is that, I don't see any more memory leaks, except SimpleConnectionThread objects. So all in all Axis2 seems good in terms of memory ( at least for me :) ).

author: chirino
msg: Get the stomp wireformat working again and added some more tests to verify that it is working.
The stomp transport factory just reuses the tcp transport and sets the wireformat to be stomp.

author: chirino
msg: only use the wire format negociator if needed.
